name: Robert J. PARSON and Mary Parson, Appellants, v. Gerald S. ALBRIGHT, M.D.

parties: Robert J. PARSON and Mary Parson, Appellants, v. Gerald S. ALBRIGHT, M.D.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Laurence J. Adams, Lancaster, for Robert J. and Mary Parson.
Linda Porr Sweeney, Lancaster, for Gerald S. Albright, M.D.
casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 201
Robert J. PARSON and Mary Parson, Appellants, v. Gerald S. ALBRIGHT, M.D.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 29, 1997.
Decided May 20, 1997.
Laurence J. Adams, Lancaster, for Robert J. and Mary Parson.
Linda Porr Sweeney, Lancaster, for Gerald S. Albright, M.D.
